content:
Craft an item of type: magma_cream
inventory=[{"type": "blaze_powder", "quantity": 1, "index": 19}, {"type": "diamond_sword", "quantity": 1, "index": 34}, {"type": "slime_ball", "quantity": 1, "index": 41}, {"type": "oak_planks", "quantity": 15, "index": 43}, {"type": "ocelot_spawn_egg", "quantity": 37, "index": 44}, {"type": "birch_planks", "quantity": 53, "index": 45}]
thought: In order to craft magma_cream, I need to place blaze_powder and slime_ball in the crafting grid. Therefore I will move the blaze_powder from slot 19 to slot 1.
act: move from slot 19 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: magma_cream
inventory=[{"type": "magma_cream", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "blaze_powder", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "slime_ball", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "diamond_sword", "quantity": 1, "index": 34}, {"type": "oak_planks", "quantity": 15, "index": 43}, {"type": "ocelot_spawn_egg", "quantity": 37, "index": 44}, {"type": "birch_planks", "quantity": 53, "index": 45}]
thought: Now that the magma_cream has been crafted, I need to move it to an empty inventory slot (eg., 11).
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 1
